text: I know it was intentional to remove private files from list/search methods in the Files API - but, would it be possible to get an additional scope added to allow access to them? :pray:

Hi Folks
Need some expert advise
I have my own Website developed on Magento and it has several links for users to download documents.
How do i track who has downloaded what document link using HubSpot

Today I have Google Tag Manager to measure the number of clicks on those links, but I'm not able to associate that with a Contact User
